text: Deepthi Vidhu Prathap (born 4 April 1984) is an Indian Actress, TV Anchor and a Classical Dancer. == Early life == Deepthi is a Post Graduate in Bharatanatyam. Dancer by profession. Performed many stages round the globe including Soorya Festival, International Dance festival, and dance productions like Poothapattu, Njanappaana, Manjurukum Puzha, Pranamam under eminent directors like Soorya Krishnamoorthy, Lenin Rajendran, T. K. Rajeev Kumar. Major ads include Chungath Prince Jewellery, Vedhika etc. == Personal life == She is married to Vidhu Prathap, an Indian playback singer in August 2008. ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
